game.name: The Interval Bureau: Extension 0
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A short psychological audio horror call where every number routes you deeper into a faceless bureau that measures and files you.
